scripts.build: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-js: terser resources/js/admin.js -o resources/js/admin.min.js && terser resources/js/frontend.js -o resources/js/frontend.min.js
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o resources/css/admin.min.css resources/css/admin.css && cleancss -o resources/css/frontend.min.css resources/css/frontend.css
